title: 85x16: Sponsorship of a Government Awards Program by Private Organization
summary: The organization could host a separate banquet honoring the recipients of the awards because as 26 U.S.C. § 501(c)(3) organization, it could under 5 U.S.C. § 4111, offer such an honor to each employee.  Each employee's agency wound need to determine under 5 C.F.R. Part 410.705 if its employees could attend.
